prompt: Design an edit profile page with a nature-inspired theme. Feature a circular profile picture at the top center with a leaf-patterned border and a camera icon at the bottom-right. Include input fields for full name, email, phone number, and bio, each with a light green filled background and rounded borders. Use a soft green background with brown accents for buttons and focused fields. Arrange the layout in a scrollable column with generous spacing. The save button should have a brown gradient. Include an app bar with a green background and white title text.
